user_input: Please create hourly demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use Hydrogen as the carrier. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format.
author: Assistant
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Decompose the annual energy demand into hourly profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios using the 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' scenarios for the years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select the relevant TYNDP 2026 scenario objects and assign the decomposed hourly demand profiles based on years 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050.

tasks.description: Add a new energy carrier object for Hydrogen using the new_carrier_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select the appropriate energy carrier context to add the Hydrogen object.

tasks.description: Split the nodes as specified in the scenario using the splitting_pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Identify and select the nodes that need to be split based on the scenario requirements.

tasks.description: Convert the model output to tst format.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Select the model output file that requires conversion to tst format based on the user's input.

function_args.user_input: Convert model output to tst format
